text:
The ratio of the posteriors is also called the posterior odds. The Ô¨Årst frac- posterior odds
tion on the right-hand side of (8.46), the prior odds, measures how much prior odds
our prior (initial) beliefs favorM1 over M2. The ratio of the marginal like-
lihoods (second fraction on the right-hand-side) is called the Bayes factor Bayes factor
and measures how well the data Dis predicted by M1 compared to M2.
